EmailTemplate.subject: Your Yodle Display Contract - please "accept"
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Case.Client_First_Name__c},
This email confirms that Customer is adding display advertising to its Yodle Sponsored Service, as set forth herein. Customer may also purchase creative Services, which will only be deemed to have been purchased by Customer if a one-time fee for such service is set forth in Section 4 of this Change Order. As noted below, to accept the terms and conditions of this Change Order, please reply to this e-mail with "Accept" in the body. This Change Order changes the Agreement in effect between Yodle and Customer. Capitalized terms used in this Change Order but not defined herein have the meaning set forth in the Agreement.
As noted below, to accept this Change Order, please reply to this e-mail with "Accept" in the body.
1. Display Advertising. Display advertising is an additional means to generate clicks as part of the Yodle Sponsored Service (the “Display Advertising Service”). Customer’s Monthly Advertising Budget for the Display Advertising Service will be used as a result of clicks on Customer’s display Ads. Customer may also choose to purchase creative Services in connection with its display Ads. The options and prices for creative Services are set forth below. Customer will only be deemed to have purchased a creative Service if a one-time fee for such Service is set forth in Section 4 of this Change Order. If Customer does not purchase a creative Service, then Customer is responsible for providing the creative for the display Ads. Platinum Package - one time fees of $6,000 o Four (4) designs o Customer selects two (2) designs o Two (2) rounds of edits per design o Two (2) sets of four (4) Ad sizes o Two (2) sets of four (4) animated Ad sizes Additional Round of Edits $500 Additional Image $250
2. Display Advertising Service Commitment Period. The minimum term of the Display Advertising Service is {!Case.Term_months__c} months, commencing on the date Yodle begins to distribute Customer’s display Ads (the “Display Advertising Service Commitment Period”), and the term will continue month to month thereafter (and Customer will be billed the applicable monthly fees on a monthly recurring basis) until the Agreement is terminated or Customer cancels the Display Advertising Service. Customer may not cancel the Display Advertising Service during the Display Advertising Service Commitment Period.
3. Display Advertising Monthly Advertising Budget. Customer’s Monthly Advertising Budget for the Display Advertising Service, which is in addition to Customer’s existing Monthly Advertising Budget for the Yodle Sponsored Service, is ${!Case.KeyWord_2__c} (calculated as {!Case.Budget__c} x {!Case.Days_Live__c} accounts). Customer’s Monthly Advertising Budget for the Display Advertising Service is a separate Monthly Advertising Budget that will be used for clicks on Customer’s display Ads.
4. One-Time Fees. Customer agrees to pay the following one-time fee(s) in connection with Customer’s Display Advertising Service: {!Case.Old_Budget__c} for creative Services - PLATINUM Package for set-up fees ${!Case.KeyWord_3__c} (calculated as {!Case.Design_Fee__c} x {!Case.Days_Live__c} accounts)
5. Monthly Fee. Customer agrees to pay a monthly management fee of ${!Case.Headline__c} (calculated as {!Case.Monthly_Mgmt_Fees__c} x {!Case.Days_Live__c} accounts) for management of Customer’s display Ad campaigns.
Except as modified by this Change Order, all of the terms and provisions of the Agreement remain in full force and effect.
This Change Order becomes effective on the date accepted by Customer. Customer accepts this Change Order by replying to this e-mail with “Accept”. This action creates an electronic signature that has the same legal force and effect as a handwritten signature on a written contract under any applicable law or regulation, and is equally binding.
Please contact your Yodle sales representative if you have any questions.
Sincerely,
Yodle Contracts Team contracts@yodle.com
